product_name: Marmot Power Stretch Half-Zip Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made of cozy Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fleece, the women's Marmot Power Stretch Half-Zip Top is smooth and wind-resistant on the outside and brushed for warmth on the inside. Polartec Power Stretch delivers warmth without weight, and offers super comfortable 4-way stretch. Flatlock seams are low-bulk and eliminate irritation. Zippered sleeve pocket holds small items. High neck adds coverage; front zipper lets you vent when your hike warms up. Marmot Power Stretch Half-Zip Top for women features a trim, athletic fit for warmth. Closeout.
short_description: Made of cozy Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fleece, the women's Marmot Power Stretch Half-Zip Top is smooth and wind-resistant on the outside and brushed for warmth on the inside.
